original_text: I will tie you up with ropes so that you cannot turn from one side to the other until you have finished the days of your siege.
korean_text: 내가 줄로 너를 동이리니 네가 에워싸는 날이 끝나기까지 몸을 이리 저리 돌리지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: I will tie you up with ropes
so that you cannot turn from one side to the other
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이쪽에서 저쪽으로 돌아눕지 못하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: until you have finished the days of your siege
